name: Paper Protection Protocol
description:
Paper Co., the top paper company in the world has assigned your mech defense unit to a company building in the Northern Region. Your protocol is to protect your assigned Paper Co. building from the angry trees or you'll be decommissioned!

Paper Protection Protocol is our submission for Global Game Jam 2023! We are really proud of this game and will continue working on it so look out for more content to come!

-- Credits --  A game by DairyDevs

Art - Jean Vigroux and Jacob Hocking

Programming - Peter Bedrick and Jean Vigroux

Music - James Calano

Playtesting - Marcus Boigris & Troy Carriere

Some assets by Kenney Assets: https://kenney.nl/assets
